description:
Hudson wants to be a porn star. I'm not sure what kind of porn he want to be in because getting a straight answer out of him on certain topics proved to be a little difficult.
He's really hot, and he has a great body and dick. But he's got this low-key, cocky, hip-hop, twenty-something demeanor that required me to take the direct approach. So that's what I did...
"So you gay, straight, or what?" I asked.
"I like people," he said and smiled coyly.
"Come on, you can tell me..."
Coy smile.
I'm guessing he's gay but I could be wrong.
His video interview was a little more revealing. We learned that he's a 20-year-old college student studying "fitness technology," although I'm not really sure what that is.
He says he loves animals and wants a monkey like the one on "Friends" and maybe a penguin someday.
To be honest, we filmed Hudson about three days ago and worked extra hard to get him on the site ASAP. I got the feeling after we finished up with him that he already had plane tickets in hand, on his way to work for a competitor.
I'm thinking we'll be seeing a lot of Hudson on the web. He is hot. And you (probably) saw him here first!
title: Hudson
